game.name: John Carpenter's Toxic Commando
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 캐릭터를 선택하고 친구 3명과 함께 팀을 구성하세요. 세상을 구할 시간이 다가왔습니다. 무시무시한 괴물 무리를 물리치며 강렬한 FPS 액션을 경험하세요! 최고의 용병 팀은 아닐지 몰라도, 당신은... 톡식 코만도입니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Pick a character and team up with three friends ‘cause it’s time to save the world. Experience intense FPS action as you obliterate hordes of terrifying monsters! You may not be on the best team of mercenaries, but you are… a Toxic Commando!
